reviews.review: Parece que os hack deu uma diminuida, otimo jogo por enquanto
Хороший тренажёр для реакции, секунды решают многое!!!
Solo hat man so gut wie keine chance aber im Team immernoch ein baba Spiel!!

Игра  была создана в балансе и были не большие недостатки, но сейчас  игра стала сильно не предсказуемой : подбор званий не равный часто кидают лидей лоу скилл к бывалым игрокам, в ранговой системе ного непонятного (10 выйграных игр подряд тебя не повысят но после 1 поражения выс сразу же понизят ) да и что говорить о тимейтах. Фактор доверия бесполезная вещь... Если всё же ты решишь сыграть то я могу пожелать лишь удачи. Ибо без неё никак. ( P.s. Желаю что бы  "тимейты" руинеры обходили тебя стороной. )
The game is awesome but there are too many cheaters and smurfs in the game. Valve should do something about it.
is ok, i think making the game free and use a prime status for secure matchmaking which is still riddled with hackers was the worst decision csgo could have ever made.
Je to fajn hra ale cheateři tam jsou no. \_(°~°)_/
i love interacting with the people in the game
Masna gierka ale vac za nic biblethump

TRash game trash teammate trash gun trash everything
Unrecommended
difficile zì ce devi giocà solo se sei bravo

After a quick play-through of this game I realized that besides the lack of updates, the sometimes non existent hit registration, wocky hitboxes, slushed ranking system, removal of bots, nerfed bhop mechanics, horrible anti-cheat system, toxic teammates, throwing teammates, and the fact that this game is only holding its head above water because of the skin economy... It's okay...

All fun and games until you get shit on by a 30 year old virgin who lives in his mom's basement and then get called out by your teammates for not being able to pull a 1v4 clutch 

10/10

MM is broken. Always ranked against people 5-6 ranks higher than us. Makes the game not enjoyable. 

Somehow I keep coming back through :|
когда будет нормальный античит, тогда поговорим
I get ban because of some using cheat  in the same fucking IP address.

Grafika není velikou předností této hry, ale jde spíše o taktizování. Mapy jsou perfektně udělané na různé smoky atd... Zbraně vypadají vskutku dobře, a dokonce i někteří agenti jsou pěkný.

Od té doby co je CS:GO free, je ve hře neskutečný počet cheaterů. Což výrazně kazí požitek ze hry a mnoho lidí přestává hrát. Často i na primu objevím někoho kdo cheatuje. Rank systém je taky celkem broken, ale to už je dlouho. Je to celkem dost náhodný.

Hru i přes tyto velké chyby doporučuji. Jelikož jde o velmi dobrou FPS hru, u které není postup úplně jednoduchý.

垃圾游戏毁我青春耗我钱财挂B也多倒钩也多傻逼游戏
G胖     C    N    M    退钱

CS:GO is a really nice game until you actually start playing it well
Then you realise things such as the deathmatch gamemode is unplayable because of the badly controlled spawns, where almost every second a guy pops up behind you.
then theres the frequent FPS drop glitches, where every other competitive match the whole teams FPS suddenly drops to 10 and we have to play like that for a couple of rounds.
Fix your game VALVE, it´s not like your not earning money off of it
doque adianta comprar essas bosta de prime so cai com hack nessa merda
Skvělá hra až na ty hackery..
great  game 10/10 very bad for those that cheat
a game worthy of your time no cap.

CS:GO Is a very competetive, and fun game when you're not playing against hackers, but while playing with friends you have a great time no matter what, I highly recommend this game for competetive games and even the community servers, such as surf, and b-hop maps.
It's very good game, but the cheaters are to much!
Отличная игра для того чтобы потерять друзей...
поддержка стима, valve абсолютно не следит за игрой, читеры в каждом матче. загибается ваша игра
it's a very very good game but sometimes people are a b*tch to me
